description: The first part of this course will highlight the skills necessary from a theoretical and practical standpoint for investing using a "fundamental" approach. The second part of this course seeks to highlight and provide the rigour and skills needed for stock selection using fundamental research with an emphasis on the Future Economy, and how certain qualitative skills are applied to portfolio management in the investments industry. This course will focus on the challenges of valuation in the face of uncertain future outcomes.
title: Corporate Financial Models & Deep Value Investing
